overview: Her name is Judy, but it might as well be Little Miss Innocence! A thrill-seeking runaway, when Judy arrives in L.A., she teams up with Carol, a trashy, streetwise slut. Carol's scheme is to move in on Rick, a rich musician who lives in the Hollywood Hills. Using their nubile young bodies as bait, the sex-games begin! Soon, they trap Rick into a sleazy lifestyle of non-stop sex and total erotic dependency. Get a horny taste of life in the fast lane. Judy did and she'll never be the same again!
title: Little Miss Innocence
